name: Ghost Hunt (samsgrafd)
description:
Our team, that contains me, Samuli Reinikka, Karri Ojala and Elvinas Seiranovas finally completed developing the game, but we are looking for some friendly, constructive feedback.

Ghost Hunt is our first game and we are looking for feedback. Ghost Hunt main idea is to fight against evil, passing the levels by solving puzzles. Game is simple to play and has dark atmosphere.

You appear in the dungeon under unpleasant circumstances and have to try your best to get out of there.
